alert.note: Alert for Howard; Sevier (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 2:53PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Sevier and Howard Counties through 330 PM CDT... At 252 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Grannis, or 9 miles west of Umpire, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... De Queen, Dierks, Umpire, Lockesburg, Gillham, Corinth, Athens, Center Point, Geneva, Muddy Fork, Lebanon, Burg and Provo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
